column4: I have two video cards in my box -  one nvidia, one ATI.  The Nvidia shows my desktop on the monitor, the ATI is blank.  Is this supported?
I do not believe you will be able to have an extended desktop across two different graphics cards, but I may be wrong. you should be able, however, to run two X screens
That sounds good enough for me.
you may have to do manual editing of Xorg.conf
